sentence:
• Shares of Arena Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: ARNA ) dropped 3.8% after posting fourth quarter loss per share of $0.11, missing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of earnings per share of $0.15
• Monster Beverage Corp's (NASDAQ: MNST ) shares rose 4% after announcing fourth quarter net sales of $540.9 million, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $522 million
• Shares of KBR, Inc. (NYSE: KBR ) slipped 13.5% to $27.62 after declaring fourth quarter earnings per share of $0.52, lower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.90
• Salesforce.com, Inc.'s (NYSE: CRM ) shares declined 5.8% after reporting fiscal fourth quarter loss per share of $0.10, wider than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.08
